org.apache.giraph.partition

接口 PartitionOwner

  • 所有超级接口:
    org.apache.hadoop.io.Writable
    所有已知实现类:
    BasicPartitionOwner, RangePartitionOwner

    public interface PartitionOwner
extends org.apache.hadoop.io.Writable
    Metadata about ownership of a partition.

    • 方法概要

      方法 
      限定符和类型 方法和说明
      String getCheckpointFilesPrefix()
      If this is a restarted checkpoint, the worker will use this information to determine where the checkpointed partition was stored on HDFS.
      int getPartitionId()
      Get the partition id that maps to the relevant Partition object
      WorkerInfo getPreviousWorkerInfo()
      Get the worker information that was previously responsible for the partition id.
      WorkerInfo getWorkerInfo()
      Get the worker information that is currently responsible for the partition id.
      void readFieldsWithWorkerIds(DataInput input, Map<Integer,WorkerInfo> workerInfoMap)
      A match for writeWithWorkerIds method - for WorkerInfos it will read just task ids from input and then find the matching WorkerInfo in the provided map and set it
      void setCheckpointFilesPrefix(String checkpointFilesPrefix)
      Set the checkpoint files prefix.
      void setPreviousWorkerInfo(WorkerInfo workerInfo)
      Set the previous worker info.
      void setWorkerInfo(WorkerInfo workerInfo)
      Set the current worker info.
      void writeWithWorkerIds(DataOutput output)
      Write to the output, but don't serialize the whole WorkerInfo, instead use just the task id

      • 从接口继承的方法 org.apache.hadoop.io.Writable

        readFields, write

    • 方法详细资料

      • getPartitionId

        int getPartitionId()
        Get the partition id that maps to the relevant Partition object
        返回:
        Partition id

      • getWorkerInfo

        WorkerInfo getWorkerInfo()
        Get the worker information that is currently responsible for the partition id.
        返回:
        Owning worker information.

      • setWorkerInfo

        void setWorkerInfo(WorkerInfo workerInfo)
        Set the current worker info.
        参数:
        workerInfo - Worker info responsible for partition

      • getPreviousWorkerInfo

        WorkerInfo getPreviousWorkerInfo()
        Get the worker information that was previously responsible for the partition id.
        返回:
        Owning worker information or null if no previous worker info.

      • setPreviousWorkerInfo

        void setPreviousWorkerInfo(WorkerInfo workerInfo)
        Set the previous worker info.
        参数:
        workerInfo - Worker info that was previously responsible for the partition.

      • getCheckpointFilesPrefix

        String getCheckpointFilesPrefix()
        If this is a restarted checkpoint, the worker will use this information to determine where the checkpointed partition was stored on HDFS.
        返回:
        Prefix of the checkpoint HDFS files for this partition, null if this is not a restarted superstep.

      • setCheckpointFilesPrefix

        void setCheckpointFilesPrefix(String checkpointFilesPrefix)
        Set the checkpoint files prefix. Master uses this.
        参数:
        checkpointFilesPrefix - HDFS checkpoint file prefix

      • writeWithWorkerIds

        void writeWithWorkerIds(DataOutput output)
                        throws IOException
        Write to the output, but don't serialize the whole WorkerInfo, instead use just the task id
        参数:
        output - Output to write to
        抛出:
        IOException

      • readFieldsWithWorkerIds

        void readFieldsWithWorkerIds(DataInput input,
                           Map<Integer,WorkerInfo> workerInfoMap)
                             throws IOException
        A match for writeWithWorkerIds method - for WorkerInfos it will read just task ids from input and then find the matching WorkerInfo in the provided map and set it
        参数:
        input - Input to read from
        workerInfoMap - Map from task id to WorkerInfo
        抛出:
        IOException
